Name: Haunted Mansion
About the game: Main features: Haunted Mansion - is a horror game in the first person where you will have to discover many mysteries. [In total immersion: Scary atmosphere, low-poly graphics to match the hardware configuration of a maximum of players. But the atmosphere will be even more frightening. A haunted mansion with a breathtakingly horrifying past. Gameplay: Walking simulator with many interactions with decorative objects. (drawers, doors, keys, etc.) Psychological horror : You will go to a mansion known to be haunted, in order to do urbex. What you film with your camera will leave indelible marks on you.
